headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ANDERSON, MARGARET EMILY

snippet: ANDERSON--Margaret Emily, of Easthampton, MA, 83, formerly of New York, died April 17. She taught at the Brearley School, was a former member of Abingdon Square Painters, First Presbyterian Church, and the Church of Gethsemane. Services being handled by Ahearn Funeral Home, Northampton MA. 1/3
